name: My Favorite Pot Roast
author: Mark D. Wilder
summary: This is the oven version that is the original I got from my mother. It is unbelievably delicious.
ingredients: 3  carrots, peeled and cut into 2-inch pieces
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Heat vegetable oil in a Dutch oven over medium heat
Cook beef in Dutch oven until browned on all sides, 2 to 3 minutes per side
Mix brown sugar, salt, mustard, and black pepper together in a small bowl; sprinkle evenly over the roast
Arrange potatoes, carrots, and onion in the Dutch oven around the roast
Pour vinegar and water over the vegetables
Place a cover on the Dutch oven and put in preheated oven
Cook until the roast is hot in the center, and just turning from pink to grey, about 4 hours
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 150 degrees F (65 degrees C)
